pdp.title: Face Cream
pdp.description: Discover the reactivating, cooling night cream to stimulate the skin overnight so you wake up with a rosy glow.

items.text: apply a little of the product to your index finger.
apply small amounts to the lower part of the eye.
spread the product from the tear duct to the outside following the eye contour.
to eliminate small wrinkles, work from the outside of the eye to the tear duct.

product.name: face cream
product.ingredients: aqua, glycerin, butylene glycol, hydrogenated coco-glycerides, glyceryl stearate se, caprylic/capric triglyceride, dicaprylyl ether, phenyl trimethicone
product.shortDescription: Discover the reactivating, cooling night cream to stimulate the skin overnight so you wake up with a rosy glow.
product.description: Light and evanescent texture, with a fresh and pleasant touch. The basic formula of two main ingredients known for a long time for their functional properties: Pure Helicine and Hyaluronic Acid. Suitable for all skin types: dry, combination, and oily. Snail slime: Nourishing, regenerating, and antioxidant properties. It also has film-forming properties such as proteins, mucopolysaccharides, allantoin, and glycolic acid; that make the skin soft, healthy, hydrated, smooth, smooth, silky. Prevents the formation of skin spots (light and dark), pimples, stretch marks, and scars, and prevents the accumulation of blemishes.
